ygData.messageBody:
I agree i do a same and i never have probs with gruping only that i do /w
15 a level more then i have eheeheh


At 15.41 26/05/99 +0000, you wrote:
>From: "Calyn Dawnwatcher" <wizcalyn@...>
>
>I find this almost unbelievable. Not only do I not have problems grouping,
>but when I join a party it usually move up to higher level creatures. We
>are not useless or unappreciated on the Bristlebane server at least.
>Perhaps you live in a heathen land (grin).
>
>By the way, I never shout for grouping. I do a /who 14 (one level below me)
>and ask individually. I have never needed to ask more than 3 people before
>grouping.
>
>Calyn Dawnwatcher
>
>
>
>>
>>As far as I can tell the wizard is pretty much useless and I have put him
>>on the side because I can't solo (tried
>>many a time) and I can't find a party that wants me.
>>
